answers.answer: if you have any pain or burning or blood in the urine its likely an infection called a urinary tract infection, Its very common and easy to cure with simple antibiotics. If your noticing that your very thirsty lately as well as the frequent urination, you many need to be tested for diabetes, in either case this is not a symptom to be ignoredm please let me know what the doctor says, of course pregnancy would explain the symptom too, but it sounds like your carefull about preventing that, best wishes. Cherie

You most likely do have a UTI however if antibiotics do not cure yoursymptoms you may need to ask your doctor to consider Interstitial Cystitis.  It is important that you get to a doctor and have this treated, it is harder to treat the longer treatment put off! There is a lot of information out there on Interstitial Cystitis.Shelly

question: i am a 17 year old female and just recently in the past few weeks i have found myself in need to urinate alot!! i don't think i am pregnant as i have been sign contriceptoin. i have preasure on my bladder and it is really annoying, i am worried to leave the house just in case i do acctually need to toilet and i pee myself. does any one have any clue what this could be? i am worried about going to the doctors cos i don't know what they might tell me. i just want to have some idea of what this could be, before i go and make an appointment...
title: help!!
